name: What A Terrible Spell!
description:
Controls:  WASD / Arrow keys, Select 3 Cards to cast the spells.

After defeating a grand enemy, you are cursed to attack yourself!

Don't think you can cheat this, if your mana reaches 100, you die!

The number in the Green tile represents the time the card needs to cast.

The number in the Blue tile represents the mana the card consumes.

Music: 

 The Great Battle by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com
